body:
Comment 1 by **Da.Waterworth**: 
Sorry, I missed:

SourceFile       = PackageClause { ImportDecl [ ";" ] } { TopLevelDecl [ ";" ] } .

I propose changing the syntax to either:

SourceFile = PackageClause [ ";" ] { ImportDecl [ ";" ] } { TopLevelDecl [ ";" ] } .

Or, as I would prefer:

SourceFile       = PackageClause { ImportDecl } { TopLevelDecl } .

for greater continuity.
